thread.title: Katherine Heigl's Latest Instagram Posts of Her Newborn Son and Family Are Too Cute
thread.title_full: Katherine Heigl's Latest Instagram Posts of Her Newborn Son and Family Are Too Cute

author: maressabrown
title: Katherine Heigl's Latest Instagram Posts of Her Newborn Son and Family Are Too Cute
text:
Katherine Heigl's Latest Instagram Posts of Her Newborn Son and Family Are Too Cute Katherine Heigl's Latest Instagram Posts of Her Newborn Son and Family Are Too Cute 
The actress shared an "impromptu family pic," as well as a selfie with her baby boy. By Maressa Brown Comments 
JB Lacroix/Getty Images Sometimes the cutest family pics come together at the most random moment! Actress Katherine Heigl and her husband of nine years, singer-songwriter Josh Kelley, just proved that with a heartwarming Instagram snap of their family of five. 
The phot features the proud celebrity parents, their two daughters, Naleigh Moon, 8, Adalaide Marie Hope, 4, and newborn Joshua Bishop Kelley, Jr. all snuggled up in a bed. "Everything about this impromptu family pic makes me laugh and laugh and laugh!!! We may have a 2017 Family Christmas card winner here people!" Heigl wrote in the caption. Check it out ... A post shared by Katherine Heigl (@katherineheigl) on Feb 25, 2017 at 5:47pm PST 
Aww, everyone looks so content, right? And the fact that it cracks Heigl up so much makes it even better! 
The family pic was posted just a couple days after Heigl shared this gem with her lil' man. A post shared by Katherine Heigl (@katherineheigl) on Feb 23, 2017 at 8:15am PST 
So sweet! New parent? Sign up for our Parents Daily Babies newsletter 
Heigl and Kelley welcomed baby Joshua back in late December. They adopted Naleigh from South Korea in 2009, and Adalaide was adopted domestically in 2012. The proud mama of three had been writing about her pregnancy experience on her blog Those Heavenly Days , and although her last entry was back when she had her baby shower for Joshua, E! News reports that the actress is gearing up to get back to her writing. Love it. Can't wait to hear what she has to report about life with her adorable brood! From the looks of it, the Kelley household is filled with tons of love â€” and fun!
